ygData.subject: What weapons to get? (was: Level 49 bard seeks equipment advice)
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye I think that is what I will do.. I hate the look of the club anyway :( So now I just have to figure out what weapons I can get in replacement... Musiker
ygData.messageBody:
Aye I think that is what I will do.. I hate the look of the club anyway :(
So now I just have to figure out what weapons I can get in replacement...

Musiker

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]

> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 49 bard seeks equipment advice

>
> time to lose the yk's. That's my opinion anyways : )
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2001 10:50 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Level 49 bard seeks equipment advice
>
>
> Hi all,
> Well Im an old bard with limited playtime and terribly
> unlucky when it comes
> to rolls *grin*. However I got lucky and got some "Silver
> Chitin Hand Wraps"
> this weekend. The stats are:
> +5 AC +3 vsMg +3 vsFire +3 vsCold +3 vsPos +3 vsDis effect:
> Haste (reported
> broken)
> Now I wonder what I should do? Should I try to sell them?
> (How much will
> they be worth?) Should I keep it for the haste when/if it get
> fixed? If I
> sell em should I sell them before or after they get fixed? I only have
> around 1-2kpp in the bank so these hand wraps is a nice
> oppotunity for me to
> get something upgraded..
> Any advice will be appriciated..
>
> Musiker Silverdrum, bard o 49 songs, bertox
>
> I currently use/have:
> Instruments: Nostrolo tamborine, Mino horn, Storebought brass
> horn, Lute of
> the Gypsy Princess
> Primary Melee: Ykeshan War Club
> Secondary Melee: Short Sword of the Ykesha
> Ranged Weapon: Runed Bone Fork
> Ear: Opalline Earring
> Ear: Opalline Earring

> Face: Mask of Deception

> Guardian helmet AC11
> some stats

> Finger: Silver Fire Emerald ring
> Finger: Silver Fire Emerald ring

> Wrist: Lambent Bracers

> Back: Cloak of the Ice Bear
